nodes.title: World Council for Health Statement on Lockdowns
nodes.excerpt: World Council for Health (WCH) is strongly opposed to the use of lockdowns as a tool to prevent the spread of SARS-CoV-2. Lockdowns, shelter-in-place orders, and mobility restrictions have been shown to do more harm than good. According to basic epidemiological theory, lockdowns do not lend to a reduction in cases over the long run […]

nodes.title: World Council for Health Statement on Omicron (B.1.1.529)

According to available evidence, the variant is not of more concern than any others.
